rustle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if leaves, papers, clothes etc rustle, or if you rustle them, they make a noise as they rub against each other
rustle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She moved nearer, her long silk skirt rustling around her.
He rustled the papers on his desk.
rustle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to steal farm animals such as cattle, horses, or sheep
rustle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the noise made when something rustles
rustle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: the rustle of leaves in the wind
